project.name: 3Dtemplate

custom-block.s: カメラの位置を %s にする
カメラの向きを %s （地点） に向ける
ガイドグリッドを作る 大きさ: %n ピッチ: %n
形状（立方体） サイズ: %n %n %n
%s の色を RGB %n %n %n にする

project.hidden: doGlide doGotoObject changeXPosition setXPosition changeYPosition setYPosition bounceOffEdge gotoXY doFaceTowards setHeading turnLeft turn forward xPosition yPosition direction doCallCC reportCallCC reportTouchingObject reportTouchingColor reportColorIsTouchingColor colorFiltered reportStackSize reportFrameCount reportThreadCount doAsk reportLastAnswer getLastAnswer reportMouseX reportMouseY reportMouseDown reportKeyPressed reportRelationTo doResetTimer reportTimer getTimer reportAttributeOf reportURL reportIsFastTracking doSetFastTracking reportDate reportGet clear down up setColor changeHue setHue changeBrightness setBrightness changeSize setSize doStamp floodFill reportPenTrailsAsCostume doSwitchToCostume doWearNextCostume getCostumeIdx doSayFor bubble doThinkFor doThink changeEffect setEffect clearEffects changeScale setScale getScale show hide comeToFront goBack doScreenshot reportCostumes alert log

block.l: container.style.width = w +"px"; container.style.height =h +"px"; renderer.setSize(w,h); camera.aspect = w/h; camera.updateProjectionMatrix(); canvas.style.width = w +"px"; canvas.style.height = h +"px"; //ctx.translate(canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2); ctx.setTransform(1, 0, 0, 1, canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2);

custom-block.s: すべてをステージから削除する

block-definition.s: カメラの位置を %'vec' にする
カメラの向きを %'vec' （地点） に向ける
照明（点光源） 強さ: %'val' % 距離: %'val2'

block.l: var light = new THREE.PointLight(0xffffff,val*0.01,val2,2); light.position.set(0, 0, 0).normalize(); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 2048; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 2048; light.name = "light"; scene.add(light); return light;

var light = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,val*0.01); light.position.set(0, 0, 0).normalize(); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 4096; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 4096; light.shadow.camera.near = 1; light.shadow.camera.far = 200; light.shadow.camera.top = 100; light.shadow.camera.bottom = -100; light.shadow.camera.right = 100; light.shadow.camera.left = -100; light.name = "light"; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 照明（環境） 強さ： %'強さ' %

block.l: var light = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff); light.color.multiplyScalar(fac/100); light.name = "light"; scene.add(light); return light;

var light = new THREE.SpotLight(0xffffff); light.target.position.set(0,-1,0); light.position.set(0, 0, 0); light.castShadow = true; light.shadow.mapSize.width = 512; light.shadow.mapSize.height = 512; light.name = "light"; scene.add(light); return light;

block-definition.s: 形状（立方体） サイズ: %'x' %'y' %'z'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry( _x, _y, _z ); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#FFFFFF" }); var cube = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); cube.castShadow = true; cube.receiveShadow = true; scene.add(cube); return cube;

var geometry = new THREE.PlaneGeometry( _x, _y, _z ); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#FFFFFF" }); var cube = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); cube.castShadow = true; cube.receiveShadow = true; scene.add(cube); return cube;

var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry( r,32,32 ); var material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color :0xffffff}); //var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color :0xffffff}); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; //obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: 形状（トーラス） 半径： %'r' 太さ： %'t'

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.TorusGeometry( r, t, 16 ,32); var material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({ color: "#ffffff" }); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

isDone = false; colladaLoader.load(url,function(result){ dae = result.scene; dae.name = "collada"; console.log(dae); mesh = dae.children[1]; //mesh.castShadow = true; //mesh.receiveShadow = true; //console.log(mesh); //scene.add(mesh); scene.add(dae); //console.log("end"); isDone = true; });

var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;

var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); for(i=0;i<65;i++){ geometry.vertices.push(new THREE.Vector3(r*Math.sin(i*3.14/32),0,r*Math.cos(i*3.14/32))); } var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;

var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); geometry.vertices.push( new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,-d/2), new THREE.Vector3(d/2,0,-d/2), new THREE.Vector3(d/2,0,d/2), new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,d/2), new THREE.Vector3(-d/2,0,-d/2) ); var material = new THREE.LineBasicMaterial({color: 0xffffff}); var line = new THREE.Line( geometry, material ); //line.verticesNeedUpdate = true; //line.elementNeedUpdate = true; scene.add( line ); return line;
return new THREE.Vector3( x, y, z );

block-definition.s: ガイドグリッドを作る 大きさ: %'_s' ピッチ: %'_p'

block.l: //GridHelper(大きさ, １マスの大きさ) var grid = new THREE.GridHelper(_s, _p); //シーンオブジェクトに追加 scene.add(grid);
var obj2 = obj.clone(); scene.add(obj2); return obj2;

block-definition.s: カメラヘルパーを作る %'light'
ステージの %'n' 番目の要素を取得
%'obj' を グループ: %'group' に追加する
%'obj' を グループ: %'group' から削除する
%'obj' をステージに登録する
%'obj' をステージから削除する
すべてをステージから削除する

block.l: var obj; while(scene.children.length){ obj = scene.children[0]; if(obj.name == "light"){ scene.remove(obj); obj = null; } else { scene.remove(obj); obj.geometry.dispose(); if(obj.material.map != null){obj.material.map.dispose();} obj.material.dispose(); obj = null; } } console.log(scene.children.length); controls.reset();

block-definition.s: サイン波 速さ %'f' 値 %'A' ～ %'B'
コサイン波 速さ %'f' 値 %'A' ～ %'B'
%'obj' の色を RGB %'r' %'g' %'b' にする

block.l: var col = new THREE.Color(r/255,g/255,b/255); if(obj.isLight){ obj.color = col; }else{ obj.material.color = col; };

block-definition.s: %'obj' をワイヤーフレームにする／しない
%'obj' のテクスチャーを image: %'img' にする

block.l: var loader = new THREE.TextureLoader(); loader.load(img,function(texture){ obj.material.map = texture; obj.material.needsUpdate = true; } );

block-definition.s: %'obj' のバンプマップを %'img' %'scale' にする

block.l: var loader = new THREE.TextureLoader(); loader.load(img,function(texture){ obj.material.bumpMap = texture; obj.material.bumpScale = scale*0.01; obj.material.needsUpdate = true; //console.log(obj.material); } )
var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); obj.material.bumpMap = texture; obj.material.bumpScale = scale*0.01; obj.material.needsUpdate = true; //console.log(obj.material);
var texture = new THREE.TextureLoader().load(img); var mat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial( { bumpMap: texture, bumpScale:scale*0.01, roughness:1, } ); obj.material = mat;

block-definition.s: %'obj' をコンソール出力する
点光源ヘルパーを作る %'light'

block.l: var lightHelper = new THREE.PointLightHelper( light, 1);//(光源,ヘルパーオブジェクトの大きさ) scene.add(lightHelper);

block-definition.s: 平行光源ヘルパーを作る %'light'

block.l: var LightHelper = new THREE.DirectionalLightHelper( light, 1); scene.add( LightHelper);
var group = new THREE.Group(); scene.add(group); return group;

block-definition.s: %'raycaster' で場所 %'vec' から 方向: %'dir' 距離: %'far' を調べた結果

block.l: raycaster.set(vec,dir.normalize()); raycaster.far = far; const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ //console.log(intersects[0]); return intersects[0]; }else{ return false; }

block-definition.s: raycaster: 2D画面内の %'x' %'y' を調べる

block.l: raycaster.setFromCamera(new THREE.Vector2(x,y), camera ); const intersects = raycaster.intersectObjects(scene.children); if(intersects.length > 0){ // ぶつかったオブジェクトに対してなんかする //console.log(intersects); return intersects[0].object; }else{ return false; }
var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); obj.getWorldPosition(vec); return vec;
var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); obj.getWorldDirection(vec); return vec;

block-definition.s: %'obj' の位置を %'vec' ずつ変える

block.l: obj.position.x = obj.position.x + vec.x; obj.position.y = obj.position.y + vec.y; obj.position.z = obj.position.z + vec.z; //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(1,0,0), vec.x); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0), vec.y); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,0,1), vec.z); //obj.translateX(vec.x); //obj.translateY(vec.y); //obj.translateZ(vec.z);
var vec1 = new THREE.Vector3(); var vec2 = new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0); obj.getWorldDirection(vec1); var vec3 = vec1.crossVectors(vec1,vec2); vec3.normalize(); return vec3;
var vec1 = new THREE.Vector3(); var vec2 = new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0); obj.getWorldDirection(vec1); var vec3 = vec1.crossVectors(vec2,vec1); return vec3;
var vec = new THREE.Vector3(); return obj.up;

block-definition.s: %'obj' の向きを %'vec' 方向にする

block.l: var up = new THREE.Vector3(0, 0, 1); var normalAxis = new THREE.Vector3(vec.x, vec.y, vec.z).normalize(); var dir = new THREE.Vector3(); dir.crossVectors(up, normalAxis).normalize(); var dot = up.dot(normalAxis); var rad = Math.acos(dot); var q = new THREE.Quaternion(); q.setFromAxisAngle(dir, rad); obj.rotation.setFromQuaternion(q);

block-definition.s: %'obj' の向きを %'vec' （地点） に向ける

input.options: source-over source-in source-out source-atop destination-over destination-in destination-out destination-atop lighter darken copy xor

block.l: if(!mode){ ctx.fillRect(x, y, w, h); }else{ ctx.fillRect(x-w/2, y-h/2, w, h); };
if(!mode){ ctx.strokeRect(x, y, w, h); }else{ ctx.strokeRect(x-w/2, y-h/2, w, h); }

block-definition.s: スプライト を整列させる
%'obj' のテクスチャ画像（陰なし）を %'img' にする

block.l: var loader = new THREE.TextureLoader(); loader.load(img,function(texture){ var mat = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0xFFFFFF, map: texture, }); //console.log(mat); obj.material = mat; } );

block-definition.s: %'obj' が影を落とす/落とさない
%'obj' が影を受ける/受けない

block.l: var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry( r,32,32 ); var material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color :0xffffff}); //var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color :0xffffff}); var obj = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); obj.castShadow = true; obj.receiveShadow = true; scene.add( obj ); return obj;

block-definition.s: %'val' の小数点 %'fig' ケタにする
%'obj' の位置を %'vec' ずつ変える （ローカル）

block.l: //console.log(vec); //obj.position.x = obj.position.x + vec.x; //obj.position.y = obj.position.y + vec.y; //obj.position.z = obj.position.z + vec.z; //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(1,0,0), vec.x); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0), vec.y); //obj.translateOnAxis(new THREE.Vector3(0,0,1), vec.z); obj.translateX(vec.x); obj.translateY(vec.y); obj.translateZ(vec.z);

block-definition.s: %'vec1' が %'vec2' で反射後の方向
%'obj' のテクスチャーを canvas: %'can' にする

block.l: var cvs = document.createElement('canvas'); cvs.width = w; cvs.height = h; return cvs;
//console.log(rc.distance); if(raydata == false){ return Infinity; }else{ return raydata.distance; }

block-definition.s: %'obj' を グローバルX 軸で %'val' 度回転する
%'obj' を グローバルY 軸で %'val' 度回転する
%'obj' を グローバルZ 軸で %'val' 度回転する
%'obj' を ローカルX 軸で %'val' 度回転する
%'obj' を ローカルY 軸で %'val' 度回転する
%'obj' を ローカルZ 軸で %'val' 度回転する

block.l: var rc = new THREE.Raycaster(); return rc;

block-definition.s: %'obj' のテクスチャーを video: %'video' にする

block.l: isDone = false; // videoタグの用意 var video = document.createElement( 'video' ); video.id = "video"; //console.log(video); video.src = videosrc; video.load(); // three.js用のテクスチャに変換 var texture = new THREE.VideoTexture( video ); texture.minFilter = THREE.LinearFilter; texture.magFilter = THREE.LinearFilter; texture.format = THREE.RGBFormat; // マテリアルに動画を貼る var material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial( { map: texture } ); obj.material = material; video.onloadeddata = function(){ video.play(); isDone = true; }
